lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I like to help someone who wants to make there lives better & has the ambition and determination to try.
lender.occupational_info: I work with wood , and do work on our local parish buildings.

lender.name: The Robinsons
lender.loan_because: We want our son to know a world that's fair and where hard work is rewarded.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky. I can.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been so fortunate
lender.occupational_info: My job is to make things from metal

lender.name: Melissa & Family!
lender.loan_because: Our family wanted to give more with what we spend at Christmas.
lender.occupational_info: In our family we have energy engineers, shop owners and me who works for a new kind of church community.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I've traveled from the caucasus through eastern europe. my family roots are bulgarian. i am actively engaged in empathizing with other people. the people who i have met on my journeys are usually more deserving of hope, opportunities and financial stability than many of those who I know in the US. I am trying to level whatever playing field that I have the power to influence.
lender.occupational_info: I create stories for the stage and screen. sometimes based on true stories, other times more based true possibilities. I believe that my art is trying to create an example of how the world could be, rather than is.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can relate to being one paycheck away from a better situation.
lender.occupational_info: Family Services Non-Profit

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I've got a little extra money, and I try to do what I can to help God's people who are in need of financial help.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a ranch near my home, and I irrigate, fence, and tend to the things that my boss needs.

lender.name: Econ Amanda
lender.loan_because: a small amount of money can make a difference, and I want my students to see that!
lender.occupational_info: I teach macroeconomics and edit and author economic educational materials. My primary areas of interest are the macroeconomics of health and welfare.

lender.name: Leanne
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Kent
lender.loan_because: It's important and it makes me feel so good!
lender.occupational_info: I dig dinosaurs in the summer.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I believe microcredit is the most ecologically sound form of foreign aid.
lender.occupational_info: I am paid by the government to take care of sick seniors in their homes. I give them baths, make their beds, feed them, clean their living areas.

lender.name: Mitchell
lender.loan_because: Karma

lender.name: Neha Chauhan
lender.loan_because: microfinance is an incredible way to make an impact in someone's life.

lender.name: Kristen

lender.occupational_info: I help build web sites.

lender.name: Lucinda
lender.occupational_info: I study philosophy in College.

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: i believed that we must all give back....all people deserve to eat and work.
lender.occupational_info: i help women birth naturally at home, teaching them that birthing this way is safe and beautiful and natural.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I can help make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I ensure that those who participate in ice hockey games play in a fair and safe manner.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I love to help and give to people wanting to improve their lives...
lender.occupational_info: I produce 2 bicycle events that raises money to help feed families in need through the Puget Sound areas.......

lender.name: Veggie Family
lender.loan_because: We are grateful for what we have and wish to repay the kindness of the world. We dedicate any merits to harmony in all families.

lender.name: Muriel
lender.loan_because: it's not just about giving away some cash and feeling good about it, it's about lending money to help a project come true, it's about knowing precisely what this money will be used for, it's a whole new approach to fund raising, that I support 100%!

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: Its the least I could do
lender.occupational_info: Learning learning, life, and marine biology at University of California Santa Cruz

lender.name: Tien
lender.loan_because: I can, and want, to make a difference.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It may have been blind dumb luck that my parents made it successfully to America as refugees and provided me the chance to succeed through intelligence and hard work. Now I can provide that chance to fellow human beings who may not have had the same lucky circumstances. Also, I loan because I am awesome.
lender.occupational_info: Life is a beautiful struggle.

lender.name: Jo
lender.loan_because: I can, and I care.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: it seems to be a good idea to help other, I mean poor people to help themselves

lender.name: Emmely

lender.name: Tristan
lender.loan_because: This is a far far more comprehensive way of financing than anything done on "organised financial markets"......

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: it makes sense to help somebody having an own business and be independent
lender.occupational_info: Consulting marketing communications

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by reading "Banker To The Poor" by Mohammed Yunus and am very enthusiastic about the impact of directly lending to entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand or fix issues with their health insurance.

lender.name: Nancy & Rob
lender.loan_because: you help people help themselves..

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I'm not a social worker so far, I wish i could assist many poor and indignant people around the world who has some skills and talent but no way to utilize it due to poor credit access and mistrust by their community per se. I'm a Ph.D. research student. I'm thinking of taking my research topic as KIVA, one of my Prof. greater suggestion. I wish i can start it by giving some loan to people who needs it through KIVA.

lender.name: Simone Brunozzi
lender.loan_because: I believe in change.

lender.name: McHale Boys
lender.loan_because: I want my children to understand better how we are all inter-connected.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time mother kept very busy by two young beautifully kind boys.

lender.name: Howard
lender.occupation: Chef, Youth Pastor, Artisit, Mission team leader

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: not too long ago a kind lady, who was a complete stranger at the time, paid for my graduate education and I want to honor her kindness by paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I assist attorneys with formatting, editing, and storing their documents, by using various computer applications (i.e. Word, Excel, Adobe, etc.).

lender.name: Eilean
lender.loan_because: Because I like to see all people succeed. Because what I spend on coffee and take-out can change a life. Because there's a real person on the other side of the world that I can help directly.
lender.occupational_info: cancer research

lender.name: Nick and Missy
lender.loan_because: I believe God calls each of us who have been blessed to help out our fellow brothers and sisters.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mother and full time nursing student. My husband works as a Controls Engineer in manufacturing plants.

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: It's a simple way to make a difference.

lender.name: Mary Ann

lender.occupational_info: to be myself, to live in this world in harmony, to make it a better place

lender.name: michele & andy
lender.loan_because: It was a wedding gift - and a fabulous idea!
lender.occupational_info: I listen to what my client wants to happen and translate it into software.

lender.name: Marten
lender.loan_because: I want to help!
lender.occupational_info: I love orchids and I try to help them from extinction. My favorites come from South America so this is were I choose to help thru Kiva.

lender.loan_because: God calls me to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Retired educator of young children

lender.name: Lisa
lender.occupational_info: I am able to do my work thanks to a good education and willingness to continue learning. I teach people, which is very satisfying.

lender.name: gina

lender.occupational_info: i work part time as a housekeeper and my husband is general contractor.

lender.name: Bill and Diane
lender.loan_because: Our son gave a gift to Kiva in our names as a Christmas gift several years ago. It is the gift that keeps on giving!
lender.occupational_info: We owned our own highway construction company. We built roads.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: this is my very tiny way to help people, especially women.
lender.occupational_info: I help add up all the items and costs that are involved in planning and then actually constructing buildings. I work with all kinds, from cabins in the woods to grand historical libraries.

lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.occupational_info: I am retired ( surgeon) and enjoy my life now.

lender.name: Ari K

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: My uncle had gotten me started with Kiva, and now I thoroughly enjoy assisting people who are in pursuit of a better life.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I make permanent drawings on people for artistic and spiritual reasons.

lender.name: emily

lender.occupational_info: I help connect businesses to resources for success, by making them aware of Chamber programs and services.

lender.name: Helen

lender.occupational_info: I take care of children.

lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: Donna

lender.name: Leah

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I know you would do the same for me.
lender.occupational_info: I'm lucky enough to be in school, and I'm learning as much as I can about our world and the people in it.

lender.occupational_info: investing in and creating internet businesses that can change people's lives. zynga enables people to connect with their friends through games.

lender.occupational_info: I work as a database marketing analyst for a leading auto insurance company.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students at Southern Illinois University.

lender.name: MyNiceTie.com
lender.loan_because: We are an entrepreneurial company that wants to help other entrepreneurs who are not as fortunate, and it makes us feel good. We donate 20% of every purchase (near 40% of our profit) to these entrepreneurs at 0% interest. When they pay it back, we re-loan the money to more.
lender.occupational_info: We pride ourselves in quality and affordable neckties. All our customers enjoy free US shipping and 120% money back guarantee.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: I believe in enterprising people who just need a hand-up. I'm thankfull to God that he's provided me the ability to give part of that hand-up
lender.occupational_info: We are a custom commercial cabinet company that builds cabinets from the floor up to fit your space.

lender.name: anish
lender.loan_because: we all deserve to live with kindness and dignity.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: It works

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to help people help themselves, and as someone living in Australia, and working in this industry, I am far luckier than many people who haven't had the same advantages
lender.occupational_info: I run a small computing company that provides training in computer software, and builds application systems.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: There is a lot of untapped potential out there. I used to live in Guinea, so it's a way for me to feel connected to Africa again.

lender.name: Craig

lender.occupational_info: I perform duties and care for my client who is in a wheelchair.

lender.loan_because: I think everybody can help !

lender.loan_because: I admire these entrepreneurs who work hard to feed their families

lender.name: Elsie

lender.occupational_info: I am attending my second year of college and majoring in Social Work.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of lending directly to an individual and being able to see how it makes a difference in her life. My husband and I just started our own business this year, and we couldn't have done it without the loan we've received. To be able to have a similar impact on the life of someone else is a blessing.
lender.occupational_info: We help business owners get organized -- their money, paperwork, inventory and processes -- so they can focus on what they do best.

lender.loan_because: i want to expand my biz , so , i want who is ready to invest on my biz or who wants to gt partnership with us , we welcomes u

lender.loan_because: I care about others.

lender.name: Christy

lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves.

lender.loan_because: I want to help other people reach their goals in life.

lender.name: Mutual Benefit Society
lender.loan_because: When one of our card playing friends, Jack McCoy, died a few years ago, we created Jack's Jar in which the winner of every hand puts in 25 cents. When the amount gets large, we've donated it to a worthy cause. Now we think Jack would like us to bet on others' dreams for the future.
lender.occupational_info: We're educators, car salespersons, bankers, psychologists, computer managers, and everyone is a poker player.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like to help start up businesses get up and running.
lender.occupational_info: I like to give back because God has been so good to me!

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: " If I can help out people then I should". I have been to Mexico and have seen poverty and wished I could have helped out in some way. This is my small portion of help to the world.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I work with sports clubs and help them market themselves better. Through this I help make sport more fun, easy and popular and get more people playing sport.

lender.name: BGB
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves to go to bed with a full belly.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: marty
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to see others have success.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I can help others.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: If among you, one of your brothers should become poor, in any of your towns within your land that the Lord your God is giving you, you shall not harden your heart or shut your hand against your poor brother, but you shall open your hand to him and lend him sufficient for his need, whatever it may be. Take care lest there be an unworthy thought in your heart and you say, The seventh year, the year of release is near, and your eye look grudgingly on your poor brother, and you give him nothing, and he cry to the Lord against you, and you be guilty of sin. You shall give to him freely, and your heart shall not be grudging when you give to him, because for this the Lord your God will bless you in all your work and in all that you undertake. For there will never cease to be poor in the land. Therefore I command you, You shall open wide your hand to your brother, to the needy and to the poor, in your land." (Deuteronomy 15:7-11)
lender.occupational_info: I am an accountant and business partner of Pauwela Cafe and Bakery in Haiku, Maui, Hawaii.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I develop computer software that makes it easier for people to access and share information.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I love helping people who want to work and help themselves. I feel fullfilled in giving others a bit of help that they can make good use of and maybe even do more!
lender.occupational_info: I help people find their best fit of work and volunteer service to people.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles and other content for websites and magazines.

lender.name: Nan
lender.loan_because: This gift was made to honor a woman who has devoted her life to helping those who are less fortunate obtain the resources and skills needed to achieve their dreams and care for their loved ones. Keep up the great work Nan!

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Juli
lender.loan_because:
There is always time to help, and Kiva lets me keep that in perspective.
Today I helped a 22 year old woman buy rice seeds for the same price I would pay for a lunch out with friends. There is always room to give.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an insurance agency in Phoenix Arizona.

lender.name: Rebeccah & Justin
lender.loan_because: It is a practical way for us to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: Rebeccah is a teacher for the Catholic Church, Justin helps corporations make deals.

lender.name: Pagh family
lender.loan_because:
It is one small thing we can do to make the world a little bit better, I hope.
Also we think it is important to show our two small girls that helping others is something we all should do, also when the one needing help is on the other side of the world.
And it is fun!

lender.name: Erin and Mikelle
lender.loan_because: Our global economy has distributed wealth unfairly and it is appropriate to assist those in countries that don't have the access to capital that we in the US enjoy. This loan model allows for accountability of funds and a chance to see good done firsthand.
lender.occupational_info: Erin sells houses, Mikelle teaches.

lender.name: Klau Family
lender.loan_because: We want to teach our children about the value of sharing what we have.

lender.name: Leslie Sheridan, DVM
lender.loan_because: Someone gave me a gift certificate and I think it's a brilliant idea!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am an animal doctor.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Freshman at Cardinal Newman High School.

lender.name: Kristin & Scott
lender.loan_because: We think this is a wonderful concept and a great way to help deserving people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Scott sells food and products to restaurants and schools. Kristin works for an interior designer.

lender.name: Martin Carlsson
lender.occupational_info: Making web stuff, more info at www.marca.se

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have such gratitude for My Reality and wish to enhance others dreams of how they would like their world to be.
lender.occupational_info: I teach, train, consult, seek spiritual truth and travel.

lender.name: COREY
lender.loan_because: I just hope to have a positive impact on those struggling to make an honest living

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I've worked in resettlement, advocacy, education and social services for refugee & immigrant families and want to help at the source of migration areas. Traveling to some of these countries has enlightened me to the potential there and enriched my life, so I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I ensure that culturally and linguistically appropriate language services are available for medical patients who cannot communicate in English or who are deaf and hard of hearing.
